name: HellFire-IRC Security Services
short_description: Hellfire (Formally Sentinel) is a set of IRC statistical and operator services for Hybrid, ircd-ratbox, csircd, +CS, and Bahamut ircd's.Hellfire provides a fully featured StatServ, a netsplit tracking and reporting service, server and nick jupe services
